title: I.Sicily inscription 000581
support: A large plaque of white marble, reused as support for a mosaic.

date._: Records death of an individual on 18 March 175 CE

provenanceFound._: Was lost for much of the C20, but rediscovered in 1974 during restoration works.

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
